document_data.name: Kagemni
document_data.mainbody: '''Kagemni''' was the first king of the city of [[Ysawis]] in the [[Cities of the Ancients|Ruined Kingdoms]] region of [[east Zakhara]].
document_data.History:
Kagemni was presented with ''[[Drinker of a Thousand Lives|Lifedrinker]]'', a sword enchanted by his brother [[Diarbekir]]. With their dying breaths, a group of [[genie]]s who had fought and lost to the great king, cursed the blade with their magic. Kagemnie then viewed his brother as an enemy and slew him with ''Lifedrinker''.

The brothers' tale was regaled in the epic ''[[Kinslayer]]''.
